title: Interpretation of a dream about the shadow of a tree

preview.html: Interpretation of sitting under the shade of a tree: If the dreamer sees himself sitting at the bottom of the tree canopy in the dream, it is evidence of his support in real life. And that this support is always available and ready to support insight into anything. Likewise, seeing himself sitting under the shade of a tree in a dream expresses the satisfaction of Almighty God for the dreamer. Vision. If the dreamer is a woman and sees that she is sitting under the shade of a pomegranate or a vine. This is evidence of the intensity of her beauty and her pride in her high status and honor among other women in reality. If the dreamer sees himself sitting under an olive tree, this is a sign that his financial situation will improve with great thanks in due time. Short. But if the man is sitting under a lemon tree, this is a sign of his marriage to a virtuous woman who will fill his life with blessings and give birth to good children. Interpretation of seeing green trees in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees a tree, this in her dream is evidence of the nearness of her marriage to a good man. If an unmarried girl sees a tree A fruitful, green, and bright tree, then this indicates her marriage to a wealthy and well-off man. But if an unmarried girl sees a dry tree in her dream, this may be a sign that she will not succeed in her marriage and that she will not be happy with this marriage. If she sees that she collects fruits from a fruitful tree, this A sign that there is someone who loves her and wants to marry her in reality. Likewise, if he sees planting trees in a dream, this is a sign of her good work and happy future. But if she sees a tall tree in a dream, this indicates her marriage to a handsome young man. If a girl dreams that she is watering trees, this A sign that her future is bright, happy, and stable. Interpretation of seeing a flowering tree in a dream by Ibn Sirin: If anyone sees a tree blooming in a dream, it indicates a life of happiness and luxury in which the dreamer actually lives. Also, seeing a flowering tree in a dream indicates discovering the dreamer’s latent enemies in reality and his victory over them. Seeing a beautiful-looking tree in a dream indicates that the dreamer has good morals and good characteristics. Seeing flowering trees laden with fruit in a dream shows the dreamer’s longevity. If an unmarried girl sees a green tree in her dream, this is good news about her upcoming marriage to a generous and just man who loves her. Interpretation of seeing a tree trunk in a dream by Ibn Sirini. The scholar Sheikh Ibn Shirin believes that seeing a tree trunk in a dream is a bad vision that indicates the difficulties of life that the dreamer is experiencing. If one sees a field full of tree trunks in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer is unable to defend himself against Dangers. But if one sees that he is taking out tree trunks buried in the ground. This is good news that he will be freed from a life of poverty and distress. In addition to an indication that he will give up control of his emotions in life situations and he will begin to face serious problems. Interpretation of seeing yourself sitting on the top of a tree in Seeing the same person sitting on a tree in a dream is a sign that he is going through a period of happiness, joy and stability in his life. It also indicates that he will soon achieve his ambitions and goals in life. And if a dead man sees a dead man he knows in reality sitting on a tree

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing analyzes in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream: Analysis in a dream. Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of a dream: Analysis in a dream. Interpretation of the meaning of a dream: Analysis in a dream. According to Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi, we present to you on the new and distinguished “Mahzat” website. Interpretation of the meaning of a dream from Analysis in a dream. Ibn Sirin says: If a person sees in a dream that a blood test is being performed and he does not Blood comes out of it, this means that the person is in good health, but if he sees that he is taking a blood sample for himself. Any person, this indicates that he will get a lot of money. But if a person sees that blood is bleeding, but the blood is corrupt, this indicates that he will get rid of worries and diseases and treat diseases. However, if he sees a large amount of blood coming out, this indicates that this person will hear Very happy news. Dream interpretation scholars say that if a woman sees in her dream that she is taking a pregnancy test and the result is negative, this means that she will hear sad news that bothers her a lot, but if the result is positive, this indicates that she will hear happy news. Interpretation of a dream about seeing analyzes for a single womanIf she sees For an unmarried girl to have a pregnancy test, this indicates that she will get married soon. However, if a man sees that he is having a pregnancy test, this means that he will live in a state of professional and family stability. Ibn Sirin says that if a person dreams of taking a sugar test, this means that he will face many problems. In his next life, but if he sees that he is conducting a urine analysis, this indicates that this person doubts his family. Seeing a urine analysis also indicates a serious weakness in the faith of the person who sees it. But if he sees that he is performing the analysis and sees blood bleeding in the urine, this means that That person’s money is forbidden, but if this person is poor, this indicates that he will obtain a lot of money in the coming period. Dream interpretation scholars say that if a married woman sees that she is undergoing a marriage test, this indicates the beginning of a new life for her and indicates happiness and stability. If she is single, this indicates that she will get married soon. Interpretation of a dream about a blood test. If the dreamer sees that a person is drawing blood for the purpose of examination and no blood comes out of it, this indicates that the dreamer is in good health. This vision also shows the death of the disease and the pain of the dreamer. Seeing that someone is taking a sample Blood means that the person will take part of the money from the donor in order to help. Seeing blood drawn while it is spoiled is evidence of death from illness and exhaustion. Seeing blood bleeding from the dreamer’s ear means that he heard happy news about the dreamer. If you see a blood test in a dream, this means good health. Seeing a blood test is a sign of improvement in the dreamer’s circumstances. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnancy test: Seeing a pregnancy test in a dream means that the dreamer will enter a new period, whether in professional, social, or emotional life. To know that a pregnancy test was performed and the result was positive, this means that you are hearing good news. As for the woman who sees that she is undergoing a pregnancy test and the result is negative, this indicates the arrival of sad news. Seeing unmarried women with a blood analysis machine is evidence that the wedding date is approaching. Seeing

title: Learn about the interpretation of a scorpion in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Scorpio in a dream for a married womanOne of the gloomy visions that the dreamer wants to know about his interpretation is that the scorpion is a very dangerous insect and sometimes its bite leads to death in real life, so what happens in a dream? Is it a sign of imminent danger, or is it different from reality, and is it good news in the following lines? A scorpion in a dream for a married woman from Ibn Sirenberg. A scorpion in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a scorpion in a dream for a married woman is one of the visions that bring with it many shameful things and indicates that the dreamer will be exposed. For many family problems and disputes. A scorpion stings a married woman in a dream, a sign that the dreamer is surrounded by some people who are conspiring against her, and because of that she will have serious disagreements with her husband, and the matter may develop and lead to divorce. Whereas if a married woman sees that she is burning scorpions in a dream This vision indicates that the dreamer has many responsibilities that she cannot bear alone and needs the support and support of her husband. For a married woman to see that there is a scorpion in her house and she was able to kill it and get rid of it in a dream, this is good news for her that she will get rid of the problems that were present. Between her and her husband and improving relations and living conditions. A scorpion in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin. According to Ibn Sirin, seeing a married woman with a scorpion in her dream is one of the dreams that warns the woman that someone is trying to disrupt her life and cause many problems and crises around her. If she sees A married woman sees in her dream a large group of scorpions sneaking into her room. This is one of the unfavorable visions and indicates the presence of a group of women who are trying to cause disagreements between her and her husband, and they must be united. Her relationship with her husband until he successfully overcame this crisis. Seeing a married woman with a scorpion standing on her hand and expelling it from her is a good sign that the woman will be able to get rid of her evil companions and stay away from the shameful actions in which she coordinated with them. A married woman sees scorpions of different colors in a dream and their size is small, so it is The good thing for her is that her due date is approaching and she will give birth to a male child. Why can't she find what she is looking for? Log in from Google, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site, and see everything that interests you. The most important interpretations of a scorpion in a dream for a married woman. I saw a scorpion in a dream for a married woman. According to the opinions of the great dream interpreters, seeing a scorpion in a dream for a married woman is one of the visions that warn her that the coming period will expose her to many problems, whether with Her husband or family members. . It affects her in a state of dispersion and the beginning of a new phase of stability in all aspects of life. A scorpion sting in a married woman’s dream. A scorpion sting in a married woman’s dream is one of the visions that arouse fear and panic in the same viewer, and indicates her husband’s connection to another woman and he is trying to ruin her life and cause many problems between them such that The matter develops and leads to divorce. Likewise, seeing a married woman being stung by a scorpion is evidence that there are people who say about her

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for something from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for something refers to many meanings and interpretations that differ from one vision to another, according to the different events that occur in the vision, as well as the situation that the viewer is going through and the various crises or circumstances that he goes through in life that affect the visions. this happens. It is seen from time to time, and through this article we will learn about the best interpretations of seeing the dead asking for something in all cases. Interpretation of a dream of a dead person asking for something. Seeing the dead asking for something from the living in a dream indicates that there are many difficulties that the dreamer is currently facing and an inability to To adapt to it clearly, and seeing a dead person asking for something in a dream indicates how great his need is. Charity and supplication. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for something from Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a dead person in a dream asking for something from one of his family members indicates the need for that dead person to pray as well as more alms in the coming period. He also explained that seeing a dead person asking something in a dream from an unknown person It indicates that you are suffering from some psychological crises during this period. Seeing a dead person in a dream asking for something from the living, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, indicates the intense sadness he feels because of his departure from him and the feeling of intense longing for him. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for something for a free man: Seeing a dead person asking a single woman for something in a dream indicates her feeling of fear and excessive anxiety about some things in her life and the difficulty of overcoming them on her own. Dreaming of a dead person asking something from an unmarried person and feeling joy indicates the high status that this dead person has in life. God as well as His good deeds in this world, and if an unmarried person sees in a dream that there is a dead person whom she does not know, asking her to stop doing something, then this is evidence of the need to take care of all the people around her. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for something for a married woman seeing a deceased person Asking a married woman for something in a dream means that there are some financial pressures that she is suffering from in reality and her inability to overcome them and for the married woman if she sees in a dream that the deceased is asking for something. For something from her and he cried, this is evidence of his need for prayer and charity. Seeing a deceased person asking something from a married woman in a dream and feeling uncomfortable means that she heard some bad news that will make her feel sad and hopeless. Approximately. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking a pregnant woman for something. Seeing a deceased person asking something from a pregnant woman in a dream indicates fear that there will be some difficulties that she will face during pregnancy and her inability to bear them for the time and suffering from anxiety. For a pregnant woman to see in a dream that there is a dead person, she knows that she You ask her to pray, as this indicates her constant thinking about death and her inability to overcome the difficulties she is currently facing due to pregnancy during pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking something for a divorced woman. Seeing a deceased person asking something from a divorced woman in a dream indicates the loneliness that she feels.

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing hair dye in a dream

preview.html: Dyeing hair in a dream: The vision of dyeing hair is one of the visions that carry different connotations. In some cases, the dye is good and in other cases it is undesirable, and the dye symbolizes life changes and important developments. Details with explanation and clarification. Dyeing hair in a dream. Seeing hair dye indicates goodness, well-being, contentment, pleasure, adornment, and care. As for dyeing the mustache, it symbolizes hypocrisy in religion, hypocrisy, and extravagance in the transactions of life, and whoever sees that he is dyeing his hands, these are worries that come to him from work and the hard work of earning, except for dyeing. . One's hair symbolizes sharing. In joys and in providing great help to others. And if you see someone dyeing your hair, this is a man who keeps your secret, hides your mistake, and does not expose your problem. If relatives dye the dreamer’s hair, these rights are taken away from them. Buying paint expresses good efforts and a special intention to do good and righteousness. Dyeing hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing dye or hair dye indicates an attempt to cover defects and hide issues, and dye is a symbol of adornment and adornment and evidence of pleasure and abundance of goodness, and changing hair color indicates A leap in quality or introduction. Extensive changes in lifestyle. Whoever sees that he dyes his hair, this indicates nourishment, happiness, and a change in circumstances, unless it is bad. Also, changing hair color without the color being consistent symbolizes hypocrisy, and changing color and hypocrisy. Dyeing hair in a dream for a single woman. Seeing hair dye symbolizes pleasure. And familiarity, adornment, joy, and renewed hope. And if she sees that she is dyeing her hair in the salon, then she will receive help and assistance that will help her achieve her goals and meet her needs, and if she gets the gift of dyeing, this indicates her popularity with others and the extent of her spread. Acceptance and love are showered upon her by her peers. As for dyeing someone else’s hair, it shows the extent of love and support given to others and participation in joys and sorrows. What is the meaning of dyeing hair black in a single woman’s dream? Seeing dyeing hair black expresses the care, benefits, and advantages that one enjoys, and positive changes. That occurs in a person’s life, getting out of adversity, reviving old hopes, and achieving goals and objectives. Whoever sees that she has dyed her hair black, she is preparing for the occasion of a big party, and she may get a suitor in the near future or apply for a job that benefits her, and she may have a valuable opportunity that is difficult to replace. . If she dyes her hair red, this indicates the harvest of long-awaited hopes and desires, and if the dye is purple, this indicates the promotion and status that she seeks. What is the interpretation of dyeing hair yellow in a single woman’s dream? Seeing yourself dyeing your hair yellow expresses the difficult vicissitudes of life. Which results from it with the least possible loss, and the yellow color is hated and indicates falling into chaos, following whims, being exposed to the envious eye, or ill health. Whoever sees the color of her hair turning yellow, this indicates bad behavior, wrong assessment of things, and moving on wrong paths. And hair dye

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a fire extinguished by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: The vision dreaming of fire and extinguishing is one of the dreams that is frightening and happy at the same time. There is no doubt that fire inspires fear in the hearts of everyone, but extinguishing it makes the dreamer feel comfortable as a result of its control, so the vision is full of meanings, both good and disturbing at the same time, and in both cases we will know in detail the opinions of the interpreters. To understand the concepts better. Interpretation of dreams about fire and extinguishing. What is the interpretation of a dream about fire and it going out? Extinguishing the fire in a dream indicates freedom from the worries that will afflict the dreamer in the coming period, thanks to God Almighty. Seeing a fire leads to exposure to some financial crises and problems that affect the dreamer, as He is exposed to anxiety in his life, which affects his soul, but if the dreamer pays attention to his prayers and worships him in the right way, he will escape from any harm. Feeling. If the dreamer wipes it with his hand in his dream, this indicates his ability to withstand the most difficult circumstances and overcome them well without causing any harm. But if he uses a fire extinguisher, this means that he got out of his crisis thanks to the help of others, and it can also indicate That he heard happy news while he was in the worst crisis, and this brings him out of his crisis. Any bad feeling that he cannot control. If the dreamer sees fire spreading everywhere but does not overcome it, this indicates a lot of worry and worry in his life, but this feeling will not last long, but will disappear after a while. Perhaps the vision indicates the fatigue that the dreamer feels in During this period, if he eats his body, this indicates the many sins that he carries, which he must erase with prayer, remembrance of God, and not abandoning worship. Seeing a firefighter in a dream is considered one of the most promising dreams for the fortuneteller, as his vision proves that he has escaped from the hardships that affected the dreamer for a long time, But he managed to get rid of it immediately and live his life as a party. He dreamed of the love of everyone around him and their ability to help him in the most difficult circumstances in which he found himself. What is the interpretation of a dream about fire and Ibn Sirin extinguishing it? Our venerable imam Ibn Sirin believes that a dream about fire leads to sins that the dreamer commits and does not repent for, so he sees the result of these actions In the form of fire in a dream. Perhaps the vision indicates the benefits that the dreamer will achieve, as fire is one of the important things that people use on a daily basis. The vision expresses advice and guidance in the life of the dreamer and that he finds help wherever he goes. Extinguishing it after lighting it in a dream is a bad meaning because it leads to... Boredom in life and the inability to meet family demands, but one must be patient and constantly remember God until he comes out of this feeling. Lighting it is a sign of the blessing of money and generosity that fills the dreamer’s life and makes him live in prosperity, happiness, and increased money. If the dreamer hears the sound of fire and feels fear This leads to multiple temptations around him and his inability to live amidst these temptations, so he must try to change them or stay away from them in any way. If the dreamer sees himself burning in his dream, this means that he will go through a harmful period.

title: Interpretation of seeing a mosque in a dream for a single girl married to a pregnant woman

preview.html:
The meaning of a mosque or mosque in a dream, whether you enter, pray, or sit inside mosques according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of the mosque in a dream. Ibn Sirin said: The mosque and seeing it in a dream indicates a person’s status in the afterlife, and the mosque is the house of God, and symbolizes benefits and indications of gain, profit, salary, and money, and the mosque symbolizes Also to the afterlife. The ruler’s house, memorial rings, or the market and war, where the matter is decided between this world and the afterlife. Dreaming of building a mosque Building a mosque in a dream indicates gaining knowledge or justice if the dreamer wants that, or indicates the brilliance of fatwa and Sharia books if the dreamer is a writer and an unmarried person who sees a mosque in a dream It portends marriage, which is success in the student’s dream, profit, and abundance of money for the merchant. Seeing in a dream the demolition of the mosque. Contrary to the interpretation of the vision of building the mosque in a dream, the interpretation of the demolition of the mosque comes because it indicates a failed marriage or lack of knowledge, loss of the afterlife, corruption of religion, and disobedience sins. Seeing the large mosque in The dream: The Sacred Mosque in a dream heralds the dreamer’s pilgrimage to it if the dreamer wishes and desires it, as the Sacred Mosque refers to the house of the Nazli or the jurist. Seeing the Prophet’s Mosque in a dream The mosque symbolizes the condition of the people of Medina, and the pulpit indicates the educated legal person who calls for good and orders good, and seeing The mosque lantern symbolizes the honest man, and the mosque carpet symbolizes the people of justice. The authority of the mosque’s muezzin and the door guard of the mosque. Dreaming of entering the mosque. If an unmarried or unmarried girl sees that she is entering the mosque to perform ablution and prayer, this portends her liberation and marriage, and for a married woman who dreams of entering a mosque, this means that she You will get money, kindness or a lot. . Diet: A pregnant woman entering the mosque in her dream indicates her safety. A man’s dream and his prayers for him portend good money or children. A vision in a dream of praying in the mosque. An unmarried woman who sees herself praying in the mosque in a dream, this gives her good news that she will achieve what she wants in her affairs, and a married woman who sees herself praying in the mosque in a dream, then this and a man Whoever sees himself praying in the mosque, this gives him good news about sustenance for whatever he wants, God willing. To see yourself sitting in the mosque in a dream. As for seeing yourself sitting in the mosque in a dream, to see an unmarried girl or an unmarried girl sitting in the mosque with one of the dhikr rings, for example, this portends her marriage and a marriage contract. Her marriage, and for a pregnant woman who sees that she is sitting in the mosque, this foretells the fulfillment of a desire dear to her related to her strength, and the same interpretation applies to seeing a man in a dream as if he is sitting in the mosque, foretelling that he will obtain money and will win, God willing. As for seeing a pregnant woman sitting in the mosque in a dream, this gives her Born, male or female, God willing, he will have a great position in religion, knowledge, money, and in general all matters.
ZOE.Interpretation of seeing the mosque - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about a bullet fired by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Dreaming of a bullet has many meanings and connotations for many people and makes them very interested in knowing it. The following article will present many interpretations on this topic that our distinguished scholars mentioned, so let us read the following. Interpretation of a dream about a ball: The dreamer’s vision of a ball in a dream indicates that he is about to enter a critical stage in His life will contain many changes in all aspects. If someone sees a bullet in his dream, this is a sign of the many bad rumors that were said about him and his silence in the face of it without even trying to defend himself. If the dreamer witnesses a bullet being fired during his sleep, this means that he does not He bears the responsibilities assigned to him well and avoids them, and this makes others not take him seriously. Seeing the dreamer in his dream shooting fire and escaping from it symbolizes his salvation from a major problem in which he was about to fall due to the determination of his enemies. Interpretation of dreams about being shot by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision For a ball in a dream is evidence of his ability to overcome a difficult period that was filled with many things that disturbed his life. If one sees in his dream that he was hit by a bullet, this means that he is afflicted with a serious illness, and as a result he will suffer from severe pain and remain bedridden for a long time. In the event that The dreamer saw himself being shot in his dream, this indicates that he will achieve many things that he has dreamed of for a long time, and this will make him very happy. Seeing the dreamer in his dream being shot symbolizes the occurrence of many good events in his life that will make him very happy. What is Interpretation of seeing a shot in a dream for a single woman? For an unmarried woman to see in a dream that someone is shooting at her means that there is someone trying to get close to her to hurt her a lot and she must be careful to be safe from his evil. If a girl sees in her dream that she is shooting This is a sign of her strong personality that allows her to deal well with all the situations she is exposed to without having to ask for help from others. If the dreamer sees during her sleep shooting and killing one of them, this indicates that she is in a very big problem that she will not be able to get rid of easily. Seeing a dreamer shooting a gun in her dream symbolizes that she has good control over things in her life and this increases her self-confidence. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman being shot. Seeing a married woman being shot in a dream indicates the many problems she was suffering from at the time, which prevent her Completely feeling comfortable. If the dreamer sees celestial bodies in the sky during her sleep, this is a sign of the happy life she enjoys with her husband and children and her wish that nothing will disturb them. If the dreamer sees a gunshot in her dream, this indicates a major deterioration in her relationship with her husband during this period because The many disagreements that occurred between them. For a woman to see a bullet falling from her in her dream symbolizes her escaping from something evil that was about to overpower her from one of her strong haters. Interpretation of dreams about shooting a woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about rabbits - Ibn Sirin Dreaming of a rabbit running in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a rabbit in a dream for a pregnant woman Interpretation of a dream of a rabbit for a married woman Rabbit in a single dream Interpretation of a dream of a white rabbit for a married woman Interpretation of a dream of a white rabbit for a girl Seeing a black rabbit in a dream Seeing a rabbit in a dream Interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq Interpretation of a dream of a brown rabbit The interpretation of seeing rabbits in a dream varies from one person to another. When you dream of rabbits, the world may smile at you and your life affairs will develop for the better and you will have better opportunities in the future. If you see a rabbit running beside you and jumping, this indicates that children will be the reason for your happiness. If you see a white rabbit, this indicates honesty in your emotional life. When you see a wild rabbit in a dream, this means that there is something that you will lose in a mysterious way. If you see dogs chasing rabbits in a dream, this indicates problems and disagreements between your friends. Interpretation of rabbits in a dream by Al-Nabulsi: It is said that rabbits in a dream indicate a cowardly person. And whoever dreams that he is contaminated with rabbit meat or skin, he will have no benefit from a woman. And whoever sees that a rabbit has hit him, a calamity or misfortune will befall him. Interpretation of rabbits in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: Little rabbits show anxiety, sadness and fatigue. And whoever sees that his rabbit has died, this may indicate that something unpleasant will happen to his children. And whoever sees that a rabbit has spoken to him, it shows him that the woman will agree with him. And whoever sees a slaughtered rabbit, his wife will not stay with him. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about henna on the legs?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about henna on the feet. Interpretation of a dream about henna on the legs in the nails: It has happy signs for the viewer. If the henna is beautiful, it is known that it is used at weddings and happy occasions, but what is its meaning in a woman’s and man’s dream, and is the meaning different if it is on the feet than it is? This presence on the hands or in the hair will be known later in the article. What is the interpretation of a dream about henna on the feet? Passage: Interpretation of a dream about henna on the feet It has many important connotations, including happy and bad. If it was bright and beautiful in the dream, it would be one of the best dreams that indicate a lot of sustenance from the Lord of the Worlds and recovery from any fatigue that the dreamer is experiencing. We find that henna on the legs in a dream indicates closeness to God Almighty, and this is what enables the dreamer to enjoy great happiness in his life, as he enjoys He does everything in his life without disobedience because he is afraid of the wrath of his Lord. The vision is an important sign of blessing for children because they excel greatly in their studies so that they can pass everything they aspire to. If the henna shape is strange and not beautiful, this leads to exposure to endless annoying problems, and here they are. It is necessary to be patient until the damage to his effects ends. The good news for the dreamer may be that he achieves his goals quickly, which makes him very happy, as he did not expect it to happen this way. Undoubtedly, the good news for the dreamer is that he will obtain a huge livelihood in the coming period. It does not stop, but he must continue his good deeds that bring him goodness and money to achieve whatever he wants. Seeing a dream means complete recovery from any disease. There is no doubt that there are many people using it as a treatment for themselves. Some of them put it on their hair to relieve headaches, as seeing it is evidence of getting rid of fatigue and pain. If the dreamer puts it at his feet often, this indicates that he is a person who pleases his Lord in all ways and does not follow any sin, no matter how tempting it may be to him. We find that it is an expression Important about his full responsibility without feeling any burden, he is not concerned with the extent and scope of this responsibility, so he succeeds because of his insistence on progress. Interpretation of a dream about henna on the feet by Ibn SirinOur greatest imam, Ibn Sirin, gave us sufficient interpretations about seeing henna, as it indicates the dreamer’s upcoming joys and that he will live for a period Without sorrows. The fear of scratching his feet is evidence of the appearance of some mysterious things that he did not want to appear at this time. Perhaps it warns him to stay away from the path he is on, and here the vision has a clear goal, which is to protect him from mistakes, so he draws closer to his Lord in order to stay away from sins. And its status Poetry is a clear sign of comfort and concealment from the Lord of the Worlds, and that his Lord will not leave him in need of anyone, but rather will compensate him with abundant money until he gets what he wants. Faced with any problem at the moment, he will immediately find the perfect solution to it, to sincerely repent for wrong actions he has done in the past. Her presence in her hands is an affirmation of the wonderful family life untainted by any discord or sadness, where the dreamer enjoys the stability that he has dreamed of all along. His life. It also drives him

Perhaps it warns him to stay away from the path he is on, and here the vision has a clear goal, which is to protect him from mistakes, so he draws closer to his Lord in order to stay away from sins. And its status Poetry is a clear sign of comfort and concealment from the Lord of the Worlds, and that his Lord will not leave him in need of anyone, but rather will compensate him with abundant money until he gets what he wants. Faced with any problem at the moment, he will immediately find the perfect solution to it, to sincerely repent for wrong actions he has done in the past. Her presence in her hands is an affirmation of the wonderful family life untainted by any discord or sadness, where the dreamer enjoys the stability that he has dreamed of all along. His life.
